line.comment: * Peaceful galaxy start = simulate recent Xenon Crisis
* Chaotic galaxy start = simulate imminent Xenon Crisis
* with a custom galaxy state we always wipe all roaming hostile ships off the map first
* NPC empires always want to refresh their truces until the next AI cycle can update this desire properly
* already spawn the Nomad flagship with lots of resources

line.text: 'Chaotic galaxy generates more starting Terraformer ships during the first few hours.'
'more OCV Invader fleets arrive in this chaotic galaxy!'

line.comment: * extra OCV worth 20% of faction power

line.text: 'Begins generating Xenon Defenders for chaotic galaxy'

line.comment: * display info box: text= $t, icon= 51, timeout= 10000, fadeout= 1000
* extra Xenon + OCV together worth 50% of faction power
* this runs for many ingame hours

line.text: 'All extra Xenon defenders from the chaotic galaxy start now on the map!'

sval.val: Peaceful Galaxy State Initialized!
The Xenon Crisis is over!
Map revealed! (chaotic galaxy)
Chaotic galaxy generates more starting Terraformer ships during the first few hours.
more OCV Invader fleets arrive in this chaotic galaxy!
Begins generating Xenon Defenders for chaotic galaxy
All extra Xenon defenders from the chaotic galaxy start now on the map!
Peaceful galaxy start = simulate recent Xenon Crisis
Chaotic galaxy start = simulate imminent Xenon Crisis
requires ZMap 1.4
with a custom galaxy state we always wipe all roaming hostile ships off the map first
sign truces
sign truce if possible
NPC empires always want to refresh their truces until the next AI cycle can update this desire properly
reveal map to player
already spawn the Nomad flagship with lots of resources
extra OCV worth 20% of faction power
display info box: text= $t, icon= 51, timeout= 10000, fadeout= 1000
extra Xenon + OCV together worth 50% of faction power
this runs for many ingame hours
